name: Buzzard's Ridge
description:
You walk out of the Saloon and see that Patrick Livingston has been murdered.

As the Sheriff of Buzzard's Ridge you will have 3 days to collect evidence and decide who killed Patrick Livingston before the perpetrator can escape.

You must use your wit and old-west detective skills to solve the case and bring the murderer to justice.

Could it be Mr. and Mrs. Reed, the new couple from out of town, or perhaps the former criminal Abraham Hammond, who now roams the streets.

Find out now by playing Buzzard's Ridge!

FEATURES:
  • 7 Different Endings
  • Over 10,000 words worth of mystery
  • In-depth clues to aid you in solving the case
